QuestData.Title: The Infested
QuestData.Description: D'kaan did not say it, but there were more rangari taken by the botani than the ones you found.$b$bHe believes they were slain. I fear worse.$b$bYou might dare to venture into the Razorbloom. If you do, you may discover what the botani do to their... "prisoners."$b$bGive these poor souls a proper release.
QuestData.CompletionText: One truth of Gorgrond: death is not the worst thing that can happen to you.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you for doing what I could not.$b$bWhile it is the right thing to do, it is hard to loose the arrow when your target was once a friend.
